title: this for Riot not players ( Riot gave me a skin reward that i already have ????? )
body: today i bought RP and got unmasked kayle skin from a chest after that i got a reward with the same skin from riot  cuz i bought RP i know it sound's selfish and bad but that means i didn't get any reward please can you gift me another skin  like Garen skin i don't mined if you took kayle skin back please answer me Riot

replies.body: Hey there, mystery gifts are random.  It's a bummer you didn't like the skin, but it might be a good idea to stick with what's available on the store if you're nervous about receiving a mystery item you won't want.  I can't make any guarantees, but reach out to our billing team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can find some options for you.
sorry i think you didn't understand me i had the skin before so that means i still didn't get anything when i got the reward
